LanguageData.Miho_BasicFactory.label: Miho Basic Factory
LanguageData.Miho_BasicFactory.description: Learn the basic skills to produce ceramics.
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyFactory.label: Miho Heavy Industry
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyFactory.description: Weapons, armor, combat drones, anything can be mass-produced.
LanguageData.Miho_MechHack.label: Mechanite Hacking
LanguageData.Miho_MechHack.description: Learn the technique to hack small mechanoids that are invisible to the naked eye. Viruses can also be viewed as biomechanites. The main purpose of this technology is to transform Miho's psychic serum.
LanguageData.Miho_Persona.label: Orch-OR theory
LanguageData.Miho_Persona.description: Teaches you the ability to implant a quantum soul into a machine.
LanguageData.Miho_Celestial.label: Archo Mass Weave
LanguageData.Miho_Celestial.description: It is a large alloy production center that is helped by Persona AI. You will be able to create "Celetial scales" made by alloying the nucleus of a neutron star with a exotic matter.
LanguageData.Miho_Drone.label: Miho Drone
LanguageData.Miho_Drone.description: We develop small drones that can transport and clean.
LanguageData.Miho_GuardDrone.label: Base Protection
LanguageData.Miho_GuardDrone.description: developing a guard drone that can protect short distances.
LanguageData.Miho_LightWarDrone.label: Light Battle Drone
LanguageData.Miho_LightWarDrone.description: developing a multi-purpose large drone that can travel on foot over long distances.
LanguageData.Miho_CommandDrone.label: Command Drone
LanguageData.Miho_CommandDrone.description: developing a command drone that can command Miho in the field with Persona AI.
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWarDrone.label: Heavy Battle Drone
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWarDrone.description: developing a heavy armored battle drone for light tanks.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon.label: Miho Weapon
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyWeapon.label: Miho Advanced Weapon
LanguageData.Miho_PlasmaWeapon.label: Miho Plasma Weapon
LanguageData.Miho_PlasmaWeapon.description: can craft Miho's weapons using elements in plasma state.
LanguageData.Miho_PlasmaCannon.label: Miho Plasma Catapult
LanguageData.Miho_PlasmaCannon.description: can craft Miho's catapults using elements in plasma state.
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelBasic.label: Miho Apparel
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelAdvanced.label: Miho Advanced Apparel
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelAdvanced.description: can weave simple Miho complex clothes.
LanguageData.Miho_Silk.label: Ebonsilk
LanguageData.Miho_Silk.description: can produce silk that is soft and resistant to heat.
LanguageData.Miho_SynthSilk.label: Synth Ebonsilk
LanguageData.Miho_SynthSilk.description: Even though it doesn't seem to fit the bill. There may be times when you have to do it!
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelEltex.label: Miho Eltex Apparel
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelEltex.description: can craft Eltex clothes that increase the limits of psychic.
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelAssassin.label: Miho Assassin Armor
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelAssassin.description: craft assassin armor that can enhance physical abilities.
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelSorcerees.label: Miho Sorcerer Armor
LanguageData.Miho_ApparelSorcerees.description: can craft sorcerer clothes that can enhance psychic abilities.
